status: MARC21-007: Platform use category of remote sensing platform
Primary use intended for the platform specified.

definition (en): Primary use for the platform is to make remote-sensing images of meteorological events and conditions.
Primary use for the platform is to make remote-sensing images of the surface of a planet, moon, etc. (including the Earth).
Primary use for the platform is to make remote-sensing images of space.
Platform from which remote-sensing images can be made is designed for a variety of uses.
Identification of platform use category is not applicable.
Platform use category is not known.
Platform use category other than meteorological, surface observing, space observing, mixed uses.
